column1: Foxes were dogs-like carnivores of woodland and farmland
column2: distinctive for their red-orange coats and their eerie plaintive cries. A fox became puzzled at finding Frodo Baggins
column4: and Peregrin Took asleep in a Firs on the first night of their journey from Hobbiton. Another fox was encountered by Aragorn and the hobbits as they hiked through the Chetwood after leaving Bree.

column1: The Quenya word for "fox" is rusco (Sindarin has rusc).
